recipe.title: Iceberg Lettuce Wedges with Stilton Dressing and Radishes
ingredients: 3 tablespoons crumbled Stilton or other fine-quality blue cheese
1 tablespoon sour cream or plain yogurt
instructions: In a small bowl mash the Stilton with a fork and stir in the oil, the sour cream, the water, and the vinegar. Divide the lettuce wedges between 2 plates, spoon the dressing over them, and sprinkle the salads with the radishes.
